protective_factors: Strong deterrent (denial of intent due to responsibility for family/children)
risk_factors: Symptoms consistent with *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate (F33.1)*
Guilt and feelings of worthlessness ('letting everyone down')
Passive death ideation ('wish I could disappear')
Inadequate response to initial dose of *Sertraline*
clinical_actions: Increased monitoring post-*Sertraline* dose change (50mg to 100mg)
Scheduled follow-up is necessary to assess response and manage side effects
Reinforce safety planning strategies if established (or establish a brief safety plan)
